extendedInfo.description: Are you tired of using multiple apps for syncing and listening to music, radio & podcasts? Download doubleTwist Music Player and get the best all-in-one music, podcast, radio & sync app:Â â¬ Enjoy Magic Radio, the personalized streaming service that seamlessly blends music from your music library with new music uniquely tailored to your musical taste from a catalog of over 13 million songs.â¬ Sync music (including iTunes playlists) to your phone from your laptop over USB or AirSync over WiFi.â¬ Download legal, high-quality album artwork for your music.â¬ Smart Playlists for easy access to your Top Rated and Most Played songs.â¬ Subscribe to podcasts and get new episodes downloaded automatically over 3G or WiFi.â¬ Stream music, videos and photos to the Xbox 360, PS3, Sonos, and AirPlay to Apple TV (black model; AirPort Express not yet supported).Â doubleTwist Player is a free download with an optional in-app upgrade to doubleTwist Pro that unlocks AirSync, AirPlay to Apple TV, podcast management, EQ and album art search. Or subscribe to Magic Radio and enjoy all the premium features of doubleTwist Pro for Free (a $9.99 value) plus unlimited, personalized music streaming with NO ADS. All for only $3.99/month.doubleTwist Music Player is handmade with â¤ in San Francisco.Â Need help with doubleTwist? http://doubletwist.com/help/Â If you have comments or feedback on our app, or need additional support, please visit http://doubletwist.com/contact/. Thanks!Â The free companion doubleTwist desktop app is not required and is only needed if you want to sync music to your phone or tablet from your Mac (running MacOS X 10.5 or higher) or PC.Â Use of this app is subject to the doubleTwist Terms of Use and Privacy Policy: http://doubletwist.com/legal/For additional information on requested app permissions: http://twist.to/JXw4fEdoubleTwist Music Player now comes with Magic Radio!

reviews.title: Loose 10 euros
reviews.comment: I have paid for the full version and each time I want to use the equalizer \"unexpected error trying to start the android eq... \"  10 euros gone um smoke
reviews.author: Gr\303\251gory Demoustier

reviews.title: Ok, but some missing features
reviews.comment: I don\'t like the constant up selling. Why can\'t the app remember my podcast subscriptions on re installs
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Podcasts section does not display results
reviews.comment: Spent Rs200 on the equalizer and the podcasts section...but apparently the podcasts section can\'t even show suggestions from different categories. The app just keeps on searching for podcasts. Selected arts, comedy, technology.. nothing shows up. Please fix this immediately. Don\'t tell me I just ~$4 on something that is  incomplete.
reviews.author: Saneesh Sukumaran

reviews.title: Great user interface, some syncing bugs
reviews.comment: Love the mobile app and how easy it is to use. It works well for the most part, but there are several albums on my itunes that it did not recognize as albums (but put each song as it\'s own album). There were some other albums whose info it did not import completely (did not import the album name).
reviews.author: Joel Baker

reviews.title: Wtf guys
reviews.comment: This was my favorite mp3 app but now it won\'t let add more song and refresh my playlist boo boo hiss hiss you guys suck
reviews.author: Henry winkler

reviews.title: Our was good until...
reviews.comment: The latest update which made it better. Awesome!!
reviews.author: Iezebel Mace

reviews.title: Support for older boxes?
reviews.comment: Sync is handy, have moved to a headless g4 as itunes server so sync helps...   can\'t figure airplay on ppc version though
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but get rid of add features button
reviews.comment: Good player, and useful. Need some skins for the player though, also I bought the full pack for $10 and the \'add features\'  button is still there, so i dont know why you still have advertising when ive already bought something
reviews.author: Ed Dougherty

reviews.title: To sum this app up in three words:
reviews.comment: Does not work.
reviews.author: Eyal Sharf

reviews.title: Perfect for music.
reviews.comment: Brilliant App! Perfect way to listen to music on android. I also love having one place to download and listen to podcasts! Would be nice for doubleTwist to sort videos by it\'s metadata just like it does for music. Also needs tablet optimisation, buttons look HUGE on Nexus 7.
reviews.author: Chris Armstrong

reviews.title: GOOD NOT GREAT.. FAST
reviews.comment: Making playlists is extraordinarily difficult making it so I can select multiple songs and then add to playlist would be a big improvement. Also 10 dollars for access to a feature as simple as album art is absurd. Love airsync
reviews.author: Justin McElroy

reviews.title: DoubleTwist just became my number one application.
reviews.comment: Love the fact that it has headphone controls - including triple press for going back a track since my HTC One doesn\'t have that functionality built in and the other apps that do, aren\'t free.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: I have been using DT for over a year now and overall it has been great. Simple to use and not fussy. My biggest gripe is the fact that when I set the album art for a song, it sets that album art for ALL the songs without album art. So I have a bunch of songs with the album art for Led Zeppelin IV lol. Thats really it, will rate it higher when this is fixed! :)
reviews.author: saul lemus

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: It works great. Love it.  Althought I wish it could do one more little thing. I would like to select a media server on my home network and list all the music from that server (instead of whats on my phone) so I can play music through my stereo. I dont want to have to stream.i have a WD media server. I want to see whats on there and play music on my stereo but control it throught this great interface. ... Is that possible.
reviews.author: Robert Martin

reviews.title: Editing
reviews.comment: Please, please PLEASE!!! add a feature that\'ll allow us to edit the names of the songs, it would the most perfect app!! <3
reviews.author: Teresa Wario

reviews.title: Music skips
reviews.comment: Really nice app, perfect for my needs, except that the music skips when playing. No good having bells and whistles when the primary function doesn\'t work! Using a Galaxy S3 with stock firmware, would love to hear from the developers if they have a fix.
reviews.author: Rory Gamble

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: Good -better-Best........ is not good ..... is not better..... is the very Best
reviews.author: Vivek Rao

reviews.title: Was working perfectly, until now.
reviews.comment: Used to work perfectly, but now I cannot get it to sync.  Well, I can get it to sync, but every single song comes up with an error, as does every playlist. Have uninstalled and reinstalled DT on both my PC and my Android device (LG L9) to no success.  As someone who paid \342\202\2549.99 to get airsync and other features, I feel very annoyed.  Would not recommend this app until it has been fixed and is working as normal.
reviews.author: Danny Kelso

reviews.title: The best internet radio app!
reviews.comment: I love it, only music player I\'ve used tht I can close out and still listen every time, the rest shut off when I try, magic radios great I\'ve noticed more live songs than Pandora or I heart, I\'ve used them all, and I\'ve also noticed on my samsung proclaim it seems to use a good bit less battery, it\'s just awesome and worth three buck sub if u go tht route! Thanks guys
reviews.author: Jason Barrier

reviews.title: love it but having some issues
reviews.comment: this it\'s the best music player I have had next to iTunes but ever since I upgraded from my Samsung Illusion (Android 2.3.6 gingerbread) to the LG Optimus Exceed (Android 4.0.4) it had been having issues reading the Android equalizer ... but other then that top programming
reviews.author: Ron Higby
